lead_paragraph: McLEAN--Linda Durfee, died peacefully at home on June 12. A Colorado native, Linda graduated Phi Beta Kappa from the University of Denver and began her career as a UN guide followed by a successful 30 year career as an institutional stockbroker. The love of her life was husband, Robert Ludlow McLean, with whom she shared 25 treasured years until his death in 2011. She is survived by her sister, Judy Snow (Roger), her stepdaughters Elissa McLean (Andy) and Maggie Suniewick (Josh) and her adored grandchildren Emmy, Sam, Theo and Benjamin. Linda was loved by everyone who had the privilege to be her friend. All who knew her well will miss her loving presence. Family private interment. Should friends desire, remembrances may be made to a favorite charity and acknowledgements to Linda's family at her home address. 1/3
